# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Create an instance of TCP.

## Declaration

```swift
init(@ProtocolStackBuilder<IP> _ builder: () -> IP)
```

## Parameters

- **builder**: The protocol stack below TCP. Defaults to `IP()`.
title: init(_:)
